item.title: The Secrets of the Shiledars
item.description: After losing his parents in an accident in childhood, Ravi is raised by the Bhatts and has a loving brother in Aditya. He grows up a history enthusiast and bumps into a judge Dixit, who reminds him of his duty as a Shiledar and reveals the mystery behind his parentsâ€™ death. Soon implicated in a crime, Ravi embarks on a quest to uncover a hidden treasure.
